Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2019...
Traded from San Francisco to Cincinnati on 3/2/2019 (Going to SF: 2B John Losey, P Deangelo Barragan, 1B Raul Rivera, P George Mundell. Going to CIN: SS Wayne Weaver, C Kenneth Opitz)...
Injured on 7/29/2019 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/24/2021 with a Torn Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Injured on 4/20/2022 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2023, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2023, off William Mettler (SEA)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2023, hitting .229 with 9 HR, 62 RBI...
Injured on 5/6/2024 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to Atlanta on 7/30/2024 (Going to ATL: P Jeremy Corvin, SS Wayne Weaver, 1B Flavio Salo, P Lenny Garrett, P Francisco Cordero Jr.. Going to CIN: P Jose Raposa, 1B Christoph
er Swiderski, 3B Walter Womac)...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,150,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2026, hitting .552 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,150,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Atlanta to Cincinnati on 2/3/2027 (Going to ATL: 2B Michael Cangelosi, 2B Pa-neru Toichi, CF John Yahei, P Frank Ambrosino, P Lee Wyrick. Going to CIN: P Hong Shaw Jr., C Wayne Weaver
)...
